text: Al-Furqan Mosque is located in the Woodside district of central Glasgow. ==The Mosque== The building can accommodate 500 worshipers. ==References== ==External links== *Glasgow Al-Furqan Mosque Official site Category:1992 establishments in Scotland Category:Mosques completed in 1992 Category:Mosques in Scotland Category:Religious buildings and structures in Glasgow
title: Al-Furqan Mosque
